query:
SELECT p.name, p.categoryId, c.name as category_name 
FROM products p 
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id 
WHERE p.slug LIKE 'salat-%'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 22Rpum9L9sZxinw.3c3b08241dc8 --database co5PUNqXK8tudZyuUEyQHS --execute SELECT p.name, p.categoryId, c.name as category_name
